Monster.Name: Spy
Monster.Description: Rulers, nobles, merchants, guildmasters, and other wealthy individuals use spies to gain the upper hand in a world of cutthroat politics. A spy is trained to secretly gather information. Loyal spies would rather die than divulge information that could compromise them or their employers.

MonsterTrait.Name: Cunning Action
MonsterTrait.Text: On each of its turns, the spy can use a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

MonsterTrait.Name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
MonsterTrait.Text: The spy deals an extra 7 (2d6) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the spy that isn’t incapacitated and the spy doesn’t have disadvantage on the attack roll.

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack
MonsterTrait.Text: The spy makes two melee attacks.

MonsterAction.Name: Shortsword
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Hand Crossbow
MonsterAction.Text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.
